channel.title: +1 Forward - Great American Witch
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/great-american-witch
Rach and Rich bring on Christopher Grey to talk about his modern gothic RPG *Great American Witch* .
Timecodes: 0:02:02 - Read a Sitch about PbtA and Failure 0:08:25 - Open Your Brain to *Great American Witch* 0:19:33 - Act Under Fire with the witches Chantell and Plussy going clubbing
You can find more of Christopher's stuff here: https://christopher.world/
